name: Black Fate Star Luck - FREE - Sci-Fi Cat Endless Street Runner Escape Game
name_original: Black Fate Star Luck - FREE - Sci-Fi Cat Endless Street Runner Escape Game
description:
Run like hell to escape the many dangers of the futuristic planet. Aliens and crazy obstacles are everywhere, but they can’t stop the black fate cat from dashing for his life.

Easy to learn and exceptionally addictive, loaded with challenges and the power-ups to help you achieve them, Black Fate Star Luck is the Sci-Fi adrenalin boost you’ve been looking for.

Features:

- Amazing 3D Graphics
- Simple controls
- Customize your gear and your Power-Ups

Light Sleepers is an independent crew of new media artists, experienced and highly professional, passionate about creating high-quality entertainment.
